Method Detail

getFooter

public static java.lang.String getFooter(java.lang.String applicationName)
Return a footer. Contains a horizontal line followed by an address element containing the generation (current) date, the generator (applicationName) and a link to the GoGui website.

getMeta

public static java.lang.String getMeta(java.lang.String applicationName)
Return meta tags for character set and generator.
